I am an Illustrator | Digital Artist | Painter living in Bhopal, India. 
Currently I work on the Oculus team at Facebook. I love talking about baseball, 
true crime podcasts, and causal inference.

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE,fig.height=2}

india_places <- data.frame(name=c("Bhopal"),
                           lat=c(23.2599),
                           lng=c(77.4126))
india_places %>%
    leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(lng=77.4126, lat=23.2599, popup="My City") %>%
  addCircles(weight=10,radius=100)
```
